data.text:
The Mauritian Rupee official currency of Mauritius.The currency code for Mauritian Rupee is MUR, and the currency symbol is ?. You can check our Mauritian Rupee to INR rates on the right side of this page and also Mauritian Rupee to INR currency converter. Mauritian Rupee is subdivided into 100 cents.

CURRENCY FACTS

Mauritian Rupee History

Mauritian Rupee has been around since 1876. Even though being very far away from USA, the top MUR exchange is with USD and this is because of tourism. Mauritius is a very popular tourist place. Along with Americans, a lot of Indians travel to Mauritius for honeymoon, vacations and to meet their relatives. That is the reason why Mauritian Rupee to INR is also very popular. A lot of money is transferred from India to Mauritius and vice versa. Because of this movement of people and money, MUR is available in Indian market and BookMyForex.com has best Mauritian Rupee to INR rates.
